verbose_text: This cooperativity between mGluR1 and alpha 1 Rs in the inhibition of GABA release onto VTA DA neurons may serve as a coincidence detector, such that when sufficient NE is present, together with glutamate activation of mGluR1s, 2-AG is mobilized to reduce GABAergic input, thereby enhancing DA neuron activity via disinhibition.
evidence: 2-AG is mobilized to reduce GABAergic input, thereby enhancing DA
